1.0.name: wordpress/hmd-picasa
1.0.description: Get all photos for your public picasa album so easily. In order to insert your post, insert a shortcode as [[hmd_album id=userid]]. For example [[hmd_album id=dung14000]]. You can see a demo here. If you have any question, don't hesitate contact with me at dung14000@gmail.com
